timeline.bodyText: Is it really important for the player to get a description entry dialog when saving the schematic for the first time? If a player cares, they can add it in later. Could be annoying to have an extra field pop up every time you want to save a small utility schematic.
timeline.author: Anuken

replies.bodyText: Yes, you are right. I'll fix it soon.
replies.author: summetdev

timeline.message: don't show desc at schem save
